Testing the urine for the presence of sugar
Th is is a test used to diagnose  women with gestational diabetes. Th is test is to be carried 
out at the fi eld level at every antenatal visit. If a woman's urine is positive for sugar, refer 
her to the MO to get her blood sugar examined and a glucose tolerance test carried out, 
if required.
